alert.note: Alert for Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 22 at 3:00PM EDT until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw affecting Pender County. For the Northeast Cape Fear River...including Burgaw...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Northeast Cape Fear River near Burgaw. * WHEN...From Sunday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Floodwaters begin to affect roads in Alligator Lake subdivision. Flooding worsens in the River Bend and River Birch subdivisions and along Croomsbridge Road and Old Maple Hill Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EDT Friday the stage was 1.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday evening and continue rising to a crest of 11.6 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Saturday morning.
